titles: Pus-mantia the mag-astro-mancer, or, The magicall-astrologicall-diviner posed, and puzzled by John Gaule ...
author: Gaule, John, 1604?-1687.
notes: Running title: Pus-mantia, or the mag-astro-mancer posed, and puzzled.
A later edition, published 1657 without Gaule's name, has title: A collection out of the best approved authors, containing histories of visions.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
